plot: Weirdness Really Bad Movie continues the Northeast Ohio tradition of hosting movies and interrupting them with original comedy sketches. Hosted on location the movie usually linked in some fashion with the movie.
plot_en: Weirdness Really Bad Movie continues the Northeast Ohio tradition of hosting movies and interrupting them with original comedy sketches. Hosted on location the movie usually linked in some fashion with the movie.

title: Weirdness Really Bad Movie
